issue.title: basic_string accidentally fails to meet the reversible container requirements

discussion.p: The complexity requirements for a reversible container () are that each function must have constant complexity. The corresponding member functions in have no complexity requirements, and basic_string unintentionally is not a reversible container (unless the implementation coincidentally provides constant complexity member functions).
